channel.title: Quest writers and Video makers wanted!
channel.description:
[b]Ruin-Scape's first quest![/b]
[i]We're proud to announce the arrival of our first quest...[/i]
If you'd like to take part in this quest writing, please fill out the following form...
[code] Name: Age: Job: Experience: [/code]
[i]What we expect from the people who apply...[/i]
1. [u]You must be willing to put 3-5 hours of work together each day.[/u] 2. [u]You must be willing to do this for pure enjoyment, and possibly a future (permanent) job with us.[/u] 3. [u]You MUST have the skills required for the job...DUH?[/u]
That's about it...PM me applications...

item.title: Quest writers and Video makers wanted!
item.dc:creator: @meowxrawr meowxrawr
item.description:
@meowxrawr wrote:

Name: Ashes
Age: 16
Job: Quest Writer/Video Maker (Doesn’t matter)
Experience: When i was alittle younger, I was the ultimate nerd and wrote quests for a game i was wanting to make…=O but (obviously) I never made the game (didn’t really understand everything), and I just trashed the papers…plus I made a few Youtube vids of Runescape, mainly level 99’s for some of my friends.
so i got a little bit of exp. for both.

Read full topic
item.source: Quest writers and Video makers wanted!

item.title: Quest writers and Video makers wanted!
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

Ruin-Scape’s first quest!

We’re proud to announce the arrival of our first quest…

If you’d like to take part in this quest writing, please fill out the following form…

Name:
Age:
Job:
Experience:

What we expect from the people who apply…

  1. You must be willing to put 3-5 hours of work together each day.
  2. You must be willing to do this for pure enjoyment, and possibly a future (permanent) job with us.
  3. You MUST have the skills required for the job…DUH?

That’s about it…PM me applications…

Read full topic
